participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Sociable and caring, Alex enjoys connecting with others and values friendships.
participant_1.background: On rainy days, I love to look at my collection of cycling-related items and think about my father. I drive a minivan because it's roomy and comfortable for my family. My favorite show is The Voice. I do not care too much about my appearance because I am more interested in making friends and having fun. My friends would be so impressed by my cupcake recipe.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and adventurous, Jamie is eager to learn and explore new experiences.
participant_2.background: I have a dog and a cat, both of whom are very well-behaved. My mother is a librarian. I want to learn more about how to overcome my fears and live a more fulfilling life. I speak fluent German. I love the fact that my job allows me to travel and meet new people.

content.text: My mother is a librarian and I love to read books but I do not read nearly as much as I would like.
I love to read too! I'm fluent in German so I enjoy reading books in both English and German.
That's awesome! I wish I knew more than one language.
It's never too late to learn! I started learning German in college and I'm still learning new things all the time.
I like to think of myself as a good listener and I'm always interested in hearing about people's experiences.
That's a great quality to have! I love meeting new people and hearing about their lives.
I do not care too much about my appearance because I am more interested in making friends and having fun.
I used to be really self-conscious about my appearance but I've learned to accept myself for who I am.
I think that's a great attitude to have! It's important to be confident in yourself.
I'm glad we agree! I think we could be good friends.
I think so too! I'd love to get to know you better.
Great! We should exchange numbers and hang out sometime.
